Name: Manual Intervention User Restrictions Enforcement
Description:
Use directly after a Manual Intervention step to enforce additional restrictions.

Use cases include: 
- Preventing users from approving their own deployments
- Restricting certain users (up to 2) from approving deployments

Parameters.Name: URE.PreventDeployerFromApproving
Parameters.Label: Prevent Deployer from approving?
Parameters.HelpText: When enabled, this terminates a deployment when the user who initiated the deployment also approves the manual intervention step

Parameters.Name: URE.ManualInterventionStepName
Parameters.Label: Manual Intervention step name
Parameters.HelpText: Select the step name from drop down

Parameters.Name: URE.ExcludedUsers
Parameters.Label: Excluded Users
Parameters.HelpText: Usernames of users to be excluded from manual intervention approvals (one per line)
